Everything, from now on, ends here.

I said I would continue to support you,

As a friend.

But, I don't want my foolish mind

To be lost in the thoughts of love,

Again.

That's why I have decided to end everything,

Everything that I am able to.

Everytime I cried because I missed you.

Everytime I tried because I wanted to make you happy.

Everytime I dreamed about the beautiful future of me and you.

Everytime I smiled when I walked next to you.

However,

There are memories that cannot be forgotten.

There are promises that cannot be gone back on.

There are images that cannot be deleted.



There will never be any more summer of love,

But there will always be you, in my sweetest part of the memories.



Don't find me, please.

Just continue on your own path.

The last word, but it's not the usual good night.

"Good bye".
Ngọt · LẦN CUỐI (đi bên em xót xa người ơi)
